message.body: I've heard Left Alive is really good
Same problems with XIII-2 huh memeFace
I can't make a bunny ReimuGlare
Why would you want to put a bunny in this game. It's full of death.
Becuz I can be a zombie bunny Derpjoubu
This is gonna take a while memeFace
I don't think so, unless I'm missing it.
The meme has just begun TPFufun
the heck lime you play dark souls?
didnt you say you have no gamepad?
I dunno, maybe it'll work WayOfWan
I did see some gameplay, so I have an idea TPFufun
well i basically inhaled all 3 games StareMiku
Also this is a Metroidvania, so I guess it's fine right? TPFufun
your going back to the tutorial section
But it's at my family's home TPFufun
in case you go and get it maybe you should replay touhou 3d
they trade items you throw at the bottom
do you prefer to find out by yourself or should i give some hints?
I know Dark Souls have a lot of conspicuous stuff TPFufun
ok you can light torches at bonfires, but lighting up the tutorial section wont give you anything
this game is full of troll comments btw
maybe you want to target mobs you fight
the feeling when im out of resfreshes and all 4 fleets have 12k power in front and back
Not sure if Warrior would had been easier TPFufun
strength is good for pve i think
I thought moving fast was better TPFufun
you can move fast with a strength build
you can reset your stats btw
in case dex gets too difficult
but you can try dex for now
you should kill firstly the giant
its an item for healing and it refils at bonfires
you are crazy to play without gamepad
you need souls to level up
just do some practice before doing the jump
press F and space same time
g2g lim try not to die too much LilZ
if you know what will happen yes
I'm getting used to dual wield TPFufun
there is sa special stance for dual wielding but you need a certain dex to activate it
i dont know the button though
I wish it was left weapon memeFace
try to hold the button for dual wielding for a longer time
maybe you are missing some dex im not sure
you already do with left click
So Lock Stance is for single wep users?
you can already with left click
you need 1.5 the weapon requirement stats on both weapons to dual wield
Why is twitch showing me an ad about nazis
I didn't expect to see you playing this
I should use the lock more memeFace
you shouldnt activate automatic running it eats your stamina
I didn't even know I turned on Auto Run limebePB
you loose max life if you die
you can recover it with humanity
did you kill the white dude?
Nope, I let him rest TPFufun
I'll keep that in mind once I get stronger TPFufun
This is gonna take a while TPFufun
Any reason to use a Shield with 2 hand? Derpjoubu
Gonna close stream I have a big game to update. 35 gigs of update
i think you can attack with it
so you could play the game using only a shield for the extra challenge
try right hand and left hand strong and weak attack
you may want to spoend 10k souls on that merchant
thee key and the pharros and at least 2 bomb
keep track of how mcuh you spend
you have itemns in your inventory that give souls if you use them
I lose them all if I lose my soul right? memeFace
you only use souls and max life on death
you should probably pay the 10k first btw but its up to you
go for either str or dex and later you can add faith or int or whatever
The wep slot also determine the power right? limebeSB
I guess I need arrows limebeSB
dont run around with so many souls
if you die twice they are gone
btw if you want less hints just tell me
But it's fine for now TPFufun
btw you can go to the place outside now if you want
jsut wanted you to get to the bonfire first
falling attacks do lots of damage btw if you can hit them
you can go inside but be careful
i always had the feeling the ai can get smarter the longer you stay in one place
but it may be just me
I guess it's just practice TPFufun
Just spam the dodge roll MikuDerp
I guess it's for Strength users
I should just ignore that guy memeFace
Maybe just ignore everyone and run memeFace
Can't walk over a Tree MikuDerp
no need to go there now
if you die before getting back the souls they are gone
thats only useful to prevent pvp
btw now you are not a husk anymore
you can get invaded while being fully human
not sure how dead the game is though
you coudl archer them back though
bow is good for dex builds
I wish I had arrows Derpjoubu
I just wanted to get rid of this guy TPFufun
its basically a one time chance to kill the boss earlier
this is so horrible without the shortcut
helbard is probably my favorite weapon
I really should lv up tho HeheHehe
you can buy items or whatever
Btw does that boss drop anything special?
its just a chance to kill him early
Why is he so tough limebePB
It's alright, that was a smart trap TPFufun
At least I didn't lose too much memeFace
now you can buy arrows and level
if you can get behind the shield guy you can backstab him, even duuring a fight
thats goes for most human size enemies
But I can't use it Derpjoubu
I'll take poison over arrows Derpjoubu
took me 5 playthroughs to find that out HeheHehe
I'll go back and Lv up and then stop
thats a good time to stop
btw why did you decide for the second game first?
Becuz the 2nd game had a 75% discount Derpjoubu
And they dun support the 1st game anymore, just the Remaster, at 10% discount memeFace
i heard it destroyed the ds1 pvp community
I herd ds3 is better tho limebeSB
you can light them at the bonfire
\and the time rises by collecting torches
have you hit the well in front of the villa?
upgrading a weapon significantly makes the game easier, but you have lmited ressources in the beginning
thats why i prefer one wepaon instea dof 2
Now I can outrange them TPFufun
well there may be better spears later but this should do Daijoubu
if you unequip the sword you have less weight
your roll gets faster and you run faster with weight percentage
i would try to level dex endurcance and hp
and keep end and hp at about half of dex
there is a soft cap at 40 then the stat is less effective
You should firstly maxed the dex If you be a swordman
so once you get to 40dex 20 end and 2 hp get hp to 40
